text: Hagi kamunta vahe'ene kva vahe'zamine, havereti'ma noma eri fatgoma hu'za negiza vahe'ene, havema taga hu'za noma eri fatgohu eri'zama erisaza vahera, ana zagonu mi'zana huzmantegahaze. Ana nehu'za Ra Anumzamofo mono noma eri fatgo hu'za kisaza zafane, ko'ma taga huno eri pehe hunte haveramina ana zagoretike mizasegahaze.
